onion soup between_the_wheels.ogg WARNING: connection hi-jacking attacks are rampant in onionland. This site's hostname is: soupksx6vqh3ydda.onion . Look at the navigation bar. If you see another hostname, leave immediately! Welcome to my onion blog. The subjects covered will be diverse, but the main focus will be on criticizing the break-down of rationality in US politics. On the right and on this page are collections of links to .onion sites. Immediately below, there's an app to test the connectivity of .onion domains running on port 80. Sometimes - if you are on a lagging connection, a .onion domain will time out, and an error message received. With this app, you can test the availability of .onion domains from this server as well. onion sniffer Below is a list of .onion IRC servers. Note: enable SSL to connect to shadownet. For instructions on how to IRC anonymously, refer to: Torring the net . dragon volatile koboijvbwowkcpj2.onion To check whether a .onion IRC daemon is online, use the tool below. It will (if available and depending on the server) return the number of users, stats, motd, etc. irc sniffer MiTM attack 05/03/14 - 06/26/14 For a period of 3 weeks, a Man in The Middle Attack has pervaded onionland. To date, over 400 .onion domains are known to have been targeted. The attack consists of at least one person creating new .onion addresses, cloning websites  on-the-fly  and re-writing the original sites' contents. The attacker can re-write any text on an original page to a  cloned  page - in real time. The primary intent appears to be BitCoin theft. Once a BitCoin ID is re-written to one of the attacker's IDs, unwitting customers send BitCoin to his ID, instead of the intended party. Even though BitCoin theft may be the object - with non-market sites cloned, a site's reputation can be ruined, connections hi-jacked and legitimate traffic diverted from the original site. The problems with these attacks are: (1) they are consuming the resources of .onion hosters by the attacker's cloning re-directs (2) they are diverting visitors via altered hyper-links to the fake sites and (3) BitCoin fraud is being committed. Below is what a HEAD request for a cloned site returned after called from the onion sniffer app . See the bolded  302  re-direct (to the original site) and  PHPSESSID  in the  Set-Cookie:  header? Connection to 42w2zwtwxqbhexsm.onion 80 port [tcp/www] succeeded! HTTP/1.1 302 Found Date: Sat, 03 May 2014 18:28:08 GMT Server: Apache/2.4.9 (Fedora) PHP/5.5.11 Expires: Thu, 19 Nov 1981 08:52:00 GMT Cache-Control: no-store, no-cache, must-revalidate, post-check=0, pre-check=0 Pragma: no-cache Connection: close Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 The only known means of blocking this attack is to match the specific cookie or the generalized  path  statement in the  Set-Cookie:  header field. With lighttpd, a rule can be created (in lighttpd.conf) to deny access to the attacker's attempts to clone the original pages by re-directs. $HTTP[ cookie ] =~  PHPSESSID  { url.access-deny = (    ) } However, the first cookie makes it through; that is, on the first pass, a browser can access the fake site, but a subsequent hit on any page of the fake site is blocked, and a  403 - Forbidden  error thrown up. To force a 403 immediately after the first page loads, the webpage can be refreshed to a new page. Update: the cloner no longer sends the PHPSESSID cookie. An NID (session) cookie is currently (06/26/14) being transmitted. [ 1 ] To block it, use the following rule, or - to thwart his future, cookie plans use the more generalized path rule [ 2 ] - along with refreshing the page: $HTTP[ cookie ] =~  NID  { Copy index.html to sindex.html. Place the following between the <head> and </head> of index.html. <meta http-equiv= refresh  content= 0; url=sindex.html > Finally, the attacker's script cannot parse ascii code. The first (or any other) letter of a site's hostname can be substituted for - by its ascii equivalent . To warn visitors of a site that connection hi-jacking attempts abound on the darknet and to identify your site as the original, a warning - containing something to the effect below and anchored to the head of the index page - should be adopted; The cloner cannot alter ascii on-the-fly, and anyone visiting the fake site can detect the hi-jacked connection - by merely inspecting the warning. WARNING: connection hi-jacking attacks are rampant in onionland. This site's hostname is soupksx6vqh3ydda.onion. Look at the navigation bar. If you see any other hostname, leave immediately! notes (1) Here's what Chrome reports about the NID cookie: Name: NID Send for: Any kind of connection Accessible to script: Yes Created: Friday, June 27, 2014 3:03:04 AM Expires: When the browsing session ends The Lighttpd rule blocks the cookie. The  Expires:  line explains why a 403 is thrown up when a page is loaded and refreshed (or any other page on the site is visited) - AFTER the browser is closed and re-opened. Below is the header from the cloner's most recent arrangement. Notice: the different Server, cookie and Location. Connection to 42w2zwtwxqbhexsm.onion 80 port [tcp/www] succeeded! HTTP/1.1 302 Moved Temporarily Date: Sat, 28 Jun 2014 07:57:04 GMT Content-Type: text/html Expires: Thu, 19 Nov 1981 08:52:00 GMT Cache-Control: no-store, no-cache, must-revalidate, post-check=0, pre-check=0 Pragma: no-cache Location: http://kpvz7ki2lzvnwve7.onion/ (2) The alternate (more generalized) blocking rule matches a different portion of the cookie field ( path ), then it denies access to the clone site. N.B., this rule will block all sites from sending cookies through the server. $HTTP[ cookie ] =~  path  { lighttpd and virtual hosts 04/18/14 To run more than one .onion website under the same instance of lighttpd, the configuration files for Lighttpd and Tor can be tweaked to set up a new, virtual domain with the  simple-vhost  directive. The following link contains the gory details: http://soupksx6vqh3ydda.onion/lighttpd_vhosts.shtml . lighttpd+Tor 04/15/14 To me, Lighttpd (pronounced  lighty ) is the .onion webserver of choice - due to its flexibility, blazing speed and excellent support for SSI, CGIs and virtual hosts. In the link is a guide for setting up Lighttpd to host a .onion domain. http://soupksx6vqh3ydda.onion/lighttpd_onion.shtml . i2p for UNIX 04/12/14 Sorry for the lack of updates, but I was blogging elsewhere in onionland and on i2p. Here's a link to my new (simple yet detailed) guide for installing and configuring the software - required to connect to the invisible internet project, i2p , under UNIX: http://soupksx6vqh3ydda.onion/i2p.shtml . Random political thoughts 09/25/13 (1) It's sobering to watch videos of helpless, compliant Americans being zapped into convulsions with tasers by the police. In the past, only those held in foreign, totalitarian dungeons were subjected to this form of electro-torture. Instead of agitating to ban torture, our new cause should be that Torture Equality, the Equal Application of Torture, the Equal Opportunity for Torture and the Equal Access to Torture are now universal human rights. (2) In history, there have been only TWO sorts of politics: first, the bad (though quite normal) politics, where politicians wreak economies with lousy policies, distribute tax-money to favorites or violate the individual rights of those they rule. Second, there are the REALLY bad politics, where politicians drop all pretense and launch wars of aggression, institute torture, commit genocide or throw people into dungeons, gulags or ovens. In one's own country - when the bad politics prevail, one should heave a sigh of relief that these politicians have not learned how to do the REALLY bad politics - yet. (3) When you re-define  America  to mean  whatever acts the government gets up to , you must - then - lie about what the government does - in order to convince yourself that  America  is not entirely revolting. (4) When a nation's  criterion of correctness  (what counts as intellectually adequate for a political idea) boils down to:  No idea which annoys the politicians and their media-stooges is true. , no-one should slap his head in amazement - wondering why most political schemes (the Iraq war, the drug war, central economic planning, etc.) fail so hideously. (5) A friend of mine was recently the victim of an attempted frame-up by local, Pennsylvania cops. (These days - in PA municipalities, police frame-ups are as common as trees in a forest or water in an ocean.) My friend quipped ( Jay Smith-like ):  I wish someone would drop a nuclear bomb on Pennsylvania!  I retorted:  If a nuclear bomb were dropped on Pennsylvania, would Pennsylvania be contaminated by radio-activity or would poor, helpless, defenseless radio-activity be contaminated by being in contact with lawless Pennsylvania? That's a real conundrum! . (6) Communism was not a political failure; It was a resounding success. When a marginal (Russian) party ascends to and persists in absolute power for over 70 years, there is no more precise criteria to calibrate a party's success. The some 80 millions, liquidated in purges, gulags and a civil war furnish the delightful proofs of its achievements. If communism were a political failure, I'd hate to witness the body-count of a political success. (7) Suppose President Obama (under a full media blitz) travels to the Washington Monument and points at it - uttering this referential contradiction:  That Washington Monument does not exist! . If an opinion poll were conducted, gauging the attitudes of the American people as to whether or not the Washington Monument exists, how would the poll turn out? Do you really want to risk knowing how this opinion poll might come out (by putting it to the test, having Obama perform the utterance then taking a poll of Americans after the utterance)? Should 33% of Americans  strongly agree  with the statement:  That Washington Monument does not exist! , would you sleep well that night (or ever again)? (8) Many who dissent from the current American horror-show (the wars, the rights-gutting, the spying, the debasing of the dollar, etc.) deceive themselves that omnipotent, political elites are - unilaterally - engineering these feats. What they observe, however, is nothing more than the outcome of millions of acts of active (or tacit) consent on the parts of their fellow citizens - who have empowered politicians to cook-up and unleash this nonsense. (9) Regarding the main justification for the Iraq war - which was an error, the refrain is that  Politicians believed that Iraq possessed weapons of mass destruction.  One question never asked is: why are US politicians elected and re-elected when they express ideas which do not correspond to reality? The toll from the Iraq war was a million dead Iraqis, trillions in US debt and regional de-stabilization, due to executing a policy based on an idea that did not fit how the world was arranged. In America - unfortunately, having ideas which tie into reality is not a pre-condition for wielding hyper-destructive power. (10) On the futility of filing a formal complaint against a dirty cop with his Chief. An analogy: if Frank  The Enforcer  Nitti murdered your wife, you would not file a complaint with Al Capone, because it was - to a high degree of certainty - Capone who ordered the hit and who would have no qualms in ordering another. (11) If I understand this idea (and I predict that I'll never fully grasp it), ALL organisms have the biological imperative to survive; It's a low-level drive, an instinct built into living creatures. However, only American, human organisms (when thrown into contact with imbeciles in tacky uniforms, i.e. the police) are expected to lose it, pretend it does not exist, suppress it, defeat it, override it, etc. Americans have gone a long way to trump their own innate programming to LIVE, when they meekly submit to execution at the hands of these murderous clowns. (12) Plato (the Ring of Gyges, from the Republic 359d-360c):  Suppose now that there were two such magic rings [rings which turn humans invisible], and the just put on one of them and the unjust the other; no man can be imagined to be of such an iron nature that he would stand fast in justice. No man would keep his hands off what was not his own when he could safely take what he liked out of the market, or go into houses and lie with any one at his pleasure, or kill or release from prison whom he would, and in all respects be like a God among men. Then the actions of the just would be as the actions of the unjust; they would both come at last to the same point.  State secrecy has been argued to be a form of invisibility. Plato's allegory of the ring of Gyges closely resembles what has transpired in present-day America, where it, state secrecy, is routinely implemented by politicians. Through clandestine, FISA court-warrants, millions of Americans have been spied on - without individualized suspicion, their knowledge or consent. Under the NDAA, Americans (and non-Americans) have been secretly detained and assassinated - without due process. Any attempt to pluck the rings from off the fingers of these politicians is met with fierce resistance, e.g. Snowden and his  revelations  have sent them into vindictive fits; A politician who wears the political equivalent of the Gyges' ring becomes (as Plato predicted):  like a God among men ; This is the expected outcome when individual rights are sacrificed to those in power, who make their deeds invisible. (13) When police atrocities frequently occur in a US municipality, the municipality, ITSELF, is defective. Its citizenry (those who can vote, do pay taxes and far outnumber the police) has NOT reined these governmental actors in. In the democracy game, i.e. majority rule, the-majority-is-the-victim-of-its-own-rotten-policing-policies complaint is NOT a legitimate move; This excuse does not fly logically. (14) Assume that the ISIS beheading videos are authentic. If you compare the Kelly Thomas (and other cops-slaughtering-civilians) videos with the ISIS videos, the technique of ISIS executioners is no more in-humane than that of US cop executioners. The US government neither invaded (nor threatened to invade) Fullerton, CA after the video, below, was circulated. One of the stated goals for re-invading Iraq and invading Syria is to  protect  foreigners from harm at the hands of foreign thugs. This curious duality of  protecting  foreigners from foreign thugs but abandoning Americans to domestic thugs demonstrates the warped priorities of the US government. (Plato: the irrational nature of democratic institutions) Absurdity: a modest critique 07/21/13 physical torture  Physical pain amounting to torture must be equivalent in intensity to the pain accompanying serious physical injury, such as organ failure, impairment of bodily function, or even death.  Above - in the Bybee memo (2002) - is how the US government officially re-defined the word  torture . [ 1 ] The definition is so narrow that much of what is practiced as torture does not count as torture. Do Bybee et al. really believe that their re-definition applies retroactively, too? Suppose the day before the definition was adjusted, a person was tortured (with a cattle-prod to his genitals), but the pain he suffered was a slight degree less  in intensity to the pain accompanying serious physical injury, such as organ failure, impairment of bodily function, or even death ). Logically, the self-contradiction that  The person who was tortured was not tortured.  cannot be true. In a political sense, however, the self-contradiction is  true . When politicians are permitted to tinker around with word-meanings in legislation or in memos, they will insist that words mean what they do not mean. In this case - however, the phenomena associated with torture do not leave reality, because a word-meaning was shuffled-around. Torture is a fact of the world, which its victims undergo; It is not a word-fact - manipulated at will to save US torturers from prison (or being held in contempt). One could redefine torture so narrowly as if to make it appear that it has never occurred. For example: the stairway to heaven torture  Physical pain amounting to torture must be equivalent in intensity to the pain accompanying serious physical injury, such as organ failure, impairment of bodily function, or even death AND the torturing party must wear a propeller beanie while reciting the first 2 verses of the Stairway to Heaven.  Does it follow that torture probably never happened - ipso facto/presto chango - just because of the above word-spell? What complaint can Americans consistently express against such a political  truth  that torture is not torture? Similar  truths  have been cynically mouthed for decades - in order to further various political objectives. In Health class - when I was a sophomore, a government-paid  drug abuse expert  declared (with a straight face) to a classroom full of 15 year old boys:  According to recent evidence: if you smoke marijuana, then you will become bio-chemically converted into a homosexual! . [ 2 ] This crack - too - is gloriously absurd, yet it is  true  in the political sense; It was relied on to assist the end of a governmental policy. With the Bybee Memo, the US government equivocated the word  torture  to save torturers from arrest. The torture-people received a free pass because a word-meaning was shifted around, but the pot-people have never had bestowed on them any get-out-of-arrest gift by such word-mangling. However, it would be easy enough to redefine the phrase  marijuana possession  so tightly (as in the case of torture) that it could be said to almost never occur, and pot possessors functionally exempted from the law, too. If the following questions were put to you by a visitor from outer-space, how would you answer:  So, you arrest the pot-people but the torture-people you allowed to run free? Are you blinking idiots? . In the primaries of 2008, Barak Obama ran to the  right  of Hillary Clinton on foreign (war-making) policy. In the presidental race, he ran to the  right  of John McCain. Obama vowed to escalate the war in Afganistan, to expand it to Pakistan and to not take the  nuclear option  (i.e. launching a first strike) off the table when  confronting  Iran over its alleged  nuclear weapons program . The media - obscenely - pronounced Obama  the peace candidate . Since the election, the war has been escalated in Afganistan, expanded to Pakistan and extended to Libya, Yemen and Syria. Only on planet self-contradiction could Obama and his policies be viewed as anti-war, but in the political sense, his absurdities are wonderfully  true . By spewing rhetoric during an election cycle, Obama ascended to a perch of near-absolute power, from where he executes his  anti-war policies  - in order to wage war after war after war. (The assertion that  Obama is anti-war in contempt of the fact that Obama is pro-war.  is an example of counter-realism, i.e. the adoption of a world-view, where  not-x is true in contempt of the fact that x is true. .) Suppose 150k years ago, a member of the Homo Sapien species saw a big cat charging for his jugular, but asserted:  That big cat is not charging for my jugular! . To this archaic one, the consequences of adopting the counter-realist stance would have been immediate, certain and final. Our Homo Sapien friend would have wound up the cat's dinner - going extinct. The adherence to counter-realism on the part of ordinary humans spells trouble. People, living 150k years ago, did not have the luxury of deluding themselves (or confusing themselves to the point where human knowledge breaks down) that  not-x is true in contempt of the fact that x is true.  Counter-real ideas could not have been embraced, for very long, by our ancient ancestors - because they (their behaviors) were continually subject to the severe, environmental constraints, prevailing in their habitats. Those drawing their salaries from the tax-payers sometimes assume the counter-realist stance as a tactic (a means to an end) to assist the realization of their political schemes, and these schemes are often grisly: the invasion of foreign nations, the gutting of individual rights, the running of secret courts and prisons, the bailing out of cronies by inflating the money supply to the point where the dollar is debased in value, etc. Politicians are not irrational because they lack intellectual acuity; They make irrational statements in order to get what they want. There's an ulterior motive behind this sort of speaking; It's the quest for (more) power. Turns out, counter-realism can be tested - experimentally. If we threw the absurdity-spewing politicians into a sealed pit, then sucked all of the oxygen out, no amount of their asserting that  the sufficiency of an oxygen supply is true in contempt of the fact that the lack of an oxygen supply is true  would save them from suffocating to death. The pit-politicians would confront that which they have turned their backs on - reality. The counter-realist hypothesis would, thereby, be refuted. America, this country, was the product of the European Enlightenment (17th-18th centuries). In Europe - for a century or two preceding it, there were religious wars, upheavals and persecutions. Western Civilization appeared to be blowing itself apart at the seams. However, a peaceful struggle was waged on the part of ordinary (and not so ordinary) people to save it. Against nearly impossible odds, the people of that age cast off the revelation-based authority of the priests, trading it for the experienced-based authority of science. The ideals of the Enlightenment: objectivity, rationality, religious tolerance, intellectual and material progress infused the basis of our institutions. However, the counter-real notions of modern politicians - a few of which were hauled out above - sharply collide with these ideals. Arguably, the Enlightenment (at least in terms of politics) has been crudely over-thrown. Those who invented this country, despite their many flaws, were civilized. They appreciated Bach. They read the Bible, Shakespeare, Locke and Hume. They understood history and our limitations as human beings - unlike the of swarm counter-Enlightenment barbarians running the power-show today. When you begin to realize that absurdity is shot-through a civilization which struggled in evolving itself - over the course of thousands of years - to oppose it, look into the mirror and point to yourself, saying this:  Absurdity is not binding on me, and I'll not swallow any politician's absurdity - ever again. . notes 1. Two days after taking office, Obama - by Executive Order - rescinded this and other  torture memos , written during the Bush Administration. 2. In 1975, there were Senate hearings, chaired by Sen. John East. The hearings went on for hours, and many of those giving testimony - literally - tripped over themselves to plant it into the Congressional record that  pot causes homosexuality . A person who maintains that pot turns straight guys into gay guys is confused about far more than pot. And:  the wild assertion by White House drug advisor Carlton Turner that marijuana may cause homosexuality  HOW THE NARCS CREATED CRACK by Richard Cowan from National Review Magazine, December 5, 1986 Plato vs. Obama 06/03/13 Let's compare one of Plato's critiques against democracy (from The Republic ) to relatively recent political events. Socrates (ironically):  19. And is not their humanity to the condemned in some cases quite charming? Have you not observed how, in democracy, many persons, although they have been sentenced to death or exile, just stay where they are and walk about the world--the gentleman parades like a hero, and nobody sees or cares?  To Plato, a person (or a group of persons) immune from the consequences of the law was an abomination. Elsewhere - in the Republic, he writes of citizens, who,  in democracy , commit crimes but are not brought to justice. He blamed the democratic mob for bringing into existence a lawless state of affairs. Plato boiled the pattern of exempting people (and groups of people) from the law down to the irrational nature of democratic institutions. Lawlessness, to him, was a trait (or a necessary outcome) of democracy, much like a computer program - which - once run in a culture, that culture becomes more lawless the longer the program (democracy) runs. In September of 2011 , President Obama assassinated an American citizen, Anwar al-Awlaki, who was accused of plotting terrorist acts against the US; On Oct 14 2011, al-Awlaki's 17 year old son was targeted and killed in a CIA drone strike . No contention came forth from the adminstration that al-Awlaki's son was involved in terrorism (or any other crime). On January 1st of 2012 , Obama signed the NDAA, which conferred on him the power to indefinitely detain (or assassinate) without due process those whom he chooses. Under the US Constitution, Federal anti-murder statutes and international law, he is absolutely prohibited from using such means to achieve military (or political) ends. On May 22 of 2013, the US government admitted to killing 4 Americans in drone attacks. The criteria for extra-legally detaining or assassinating a person and any evidence compiled against a person, extra-legally detained or assassinated, are  state secrets ; The criteria and the evidence are black-boxes into which no one except the President (and a few officials) may peer. No decision on the part of the Executive Branch, surrounding a detention or an assassination, is claimed to be reviewable by a court of law. Suppose the next time you vote, there's a warning-sticker on the voting machine, etched in red, running:  For whom you vote for is no longer secret, and if you cast your ballot for a politician who commits assassination or suspends habeus corpus, you will be culpable - as an accomplice - subject to fine, imprisonment and/or execution. . From that moment forth, voting would - probably - cease in the USA; Few would risk such negative consequences, in order to experience the fleeting thrill of voting a screw-ball politician into power. This is Plato's most potent critique of democracy: Democratic citizens are cowards who empower lawlessness; They hide behind demogogues - in their anonymity - as part of an amorphous mob. No one in the mob can be held directly and individually accountable for his involvement in elevating a politician into power. This slam against democracy was (and remains) his most stinging. An objection (chanted almost as a refrain) to my criticism is that:  The US is not a democracy, but a Constitutional Republic! . However, the policies referred to above are devised and executed by elected (and appointed) US politicians, who refuse to recognize and enforce the individual rights, spelled out in the US Constitution - namely the 5th and 6th Amendment prohibitions against detaining and executing persons without due process. Are not these violations - truly - the products of democracy? A Socratic response to Obama's lawlessness:  How charming it is that President Obama openly boasts of extra-legally assassinating Americans, but he remains free,  parades like a hero and nobody sees or cares?  Even more charming is the mob who projected Obama into near-absolute power; They, too, are un-accountable, and  nobody sees or cares?   A legal response to Obama's lawlessness:  The government is the potent omnipresent teacher. For good or ill it teaches the whole people by its example. Crime is contagious. If the government becomes a lawbreaker, it breeds contempt for law; it invites every man to become a law unto himself; it invites anarchy. To declare that the end justifies the means -- to declare that the government may commit crimes -- would bring terrible retribution.  -- Justice Louis D. Brandeis archives

Community Partners About DeepSec The Call for Papers for DeepSec 2014! is open! We are looking for talk and workshop submissions! Make sure you follow the news on our blog . Bringing together the world's most renowned security professionals from academics, government, industry, and the underground hacking community. DeepINTEL 2013 was a success! The plan for DeepINTEL 2015 is currently in preparation, and the Call for Papers is open. Please send your submissions by e-mail to: cfp (at) deepsec (dot) net The DeepSec IDSC is an annual European two-day in-depth conference on computer, network, and application security. DeepSec IDSC 2014 will be held from November 18th to 21th 2014 at the Imperial Riding School Vienna, and aims to bring together the leading security experts from all over the world. The Call for Paper for DeepSec 2014 ends soon. Please submit all your content until 31 July 2014! DeepSec IDSC is a non-product, non-vendor-biased conference event. Our aim is to present the best research and experience from the fields' leading experts. Intended target audience: Security Officers, Security Professionals and Product Vendors, IT Decision Makers, Policy Makers, Security-/Network-/Firewall-Admins, Hackers and Software Developers. In the past this conference has been attended by: Ericsson, Commerzbank, Philips, RBT, GRZ IT, IERN Sierra Leone, SAP AG, Improware, Telekom Austria, Microsoft, BAWAG P.S.K., T-Systems, Iphos, Sektion Eins, T-Mobile, Red Hat, SWITCH, Austrian National Bank, Daimler AG, Sentrigo, University of Vienna, SEC Consult, Tech Data, S21Sec, DHL, Bearing Point, Cygnos, wecon, YCO, Rolex SA, IronPort Systems, Microsoft, Cisco Systems, Oracle Corporation, Northrop Grumman, Sourcefire, and many others.

To use GlobaLeaks Cookies must be enabled. The application makes use of Cookies only for security purposes and without tracking any data. Warning! You are not Anonymous. With a HTTPS submission you are exposing yourself to the risks that someone else will know that you have submitted something, without knowing what you have submitted. Instead with an Anonymous Submission you are fully protected, it is not possible for a third party to know that you have submitted something nor what you have submitted. We strongly advise you to go for an Anonymous Submission. To make an Anonymous Submission, instead of using your usual Web Browser (Internet Explorer, Chrome, Firefox, Opera, etc.) you should use the Tor Browser Bundle , this is a special piece of software designed to enable Anonymous Web Browsing. Which of the following statements is true? HTTPS protects my identity, but not the content of my leak HTTPS protects the content of my leak but not my identity HTTPS does not protect the content of my leak nor my identity HTTPS does protect my identity and the content of my leak You are aware of the risks involved. Go ahead, but consider yourself warned.

Welcome to our mirror server! Here you can find copies of data found elsewhere. It is mirrored simply for our convenience (i.e. distributing software updates). All content is used according to its copyright (please let us know if we missed something, so that we can take any content down that shouldn't be available for download). Nevertheless you may download anything you find in this directory. Please don't index this site. It is not meant to be found in search engines. If you download software archives such as tar files or ISO images, please make sure that you check the appropriate checksums and cryptographic signatures! Please note that the server configuration has been changed to SSL/TLS-only! This means that you can continue to use old URLs to this site, but you have to change http:// to https://. Please note that the server configuration has been changed to limit access to browsers and clients equipped with a X.509 certificate from our own Certificate Authority! We have decided to do this because we wish to avoid accidental data leaks and wish to control access to this web server. Apache2 Debian Default Page It works! This is the default welcome page used to test the correct operation of the Apache2 server after installation on Debian systems. If you can read this page, it means that the Apache HTTP server installed at this site is working properly. You should replace this file (located at /var/www/html/index.html) before continuing to operate your HTTP server. If you are a normal user of this web site and don't know what this page is about, this probably means that the site is currently unavailable due to maintenance. If the problem persists, please contact the site's administrator. Configuration Overview Debian's Apache2 default configuration is different from the upstream default configuration, and split into several files optimized for interaction with Debian tools. The configuration system is fully documented in /usr/share/doc/apache2/README.Debian.gz. Refer to this for the full documentation. Documentation for the web server itself can be found by accessing the manual if the apache2-doc package was installed on this server. The configuration layout for an Apache2 web server installation on Debian systems is as follows: /etc/apache2/ |-- apache2.conf | `-- ports.conf |-- mods-enabled | |-- *.load | `-- *.conf |-- conf-enabled | `-- *.conf |-- sites-enabled | `-- *.conf apache2.conf is the main configuration file. It puts the pieces together by including all remaining configuration files when starting up the web server. ports.conf is always included from the main configuration file. It is used to determine the listening ports for incoming connections, and this file can be customized anytime. Configuration files in the mods-enabled/, conf-enabled/ and sites-enabled/ directories contain particular configuration snippets which manage modules, global configuration fragments, or virtual host configurations, respectively. They are activated by symlinking available configuration files from their respective *-available/ counterparts. These should be managed by using our helpers a2enmod , a2dismod , a2ensite , a2dissite , and a2enconf , a2disconf . See their respective man pages for detailed information. The binary is called apache2. Due to the use of environment variables, in the default configuration, apache2 needs to be started/stopped with /etc/init.d/apache2 or apache2ctl. Calling /usr/bin/apache2 directly will not work with the default configuration. Document Roots By default, Debian does not allow access through the web browser to any file apart of those located in /var/www, public_html directories (when enabled) and /usr/share (for web applications). If your site is using a web document root located elsewhere (such as in /srv) you may need to whitelist your document root directory in /etc/apache2/apache2.conf. The default Debian document root is /var/www/html. You can make your own virtual hosts under /var/www. This is different to previous releases which provides better security out of the box. Reporting Problems Please use the reportbug tool to report bugs in the Apache2 package with Debian. However, check existing bug reports before reporting a new bug. Please report bugs specific to modules (such as PHP and others) to respective packages, not to the web server itself.

سایت خبری تحلیلی کلمه در حال بارگذاری در صورتی که سرعت ارتباط اینترنتی شما کم است، می توانید از نسخه کم حجم جهت دسترسی به مطالب سایت استفاده کنید! یکشنبه, ۳۰ شهریور, ۱۳۹۳ ترمیم نشدن زخم‌های ناشی از فتنه‌های احمدی‌نژاد، خلاف تدبیر است مرعشی: حصر هم غیرقانونی است و هم خلاف اخلاق و انصاف/ مسئولان باید در پیشگاه خدا و ملت پاسخگو باشند‬ مملکت قانون و دادگاه دارد. مگر می‌شود کسی را که محاکمه نشده است، و جز ضربه زدن به پیکره سیاسی... شنبه, ۲۹ شهریور, ۱۳۹۳ انتقال میرحسین موسوی به بیمارستان برای عمل جراحی چشم میرحسین موسوی که به توصیه پزشک معالج از حدود دو ماه پیش نیاز به عمل چشم داشت، غروب امروز شنبه شنبه، مبارز پس از انقلاب، مدعی خون شهدا «مطهری زمان» با تاریخ دست به گریبان است. تاریخی که هنوز سازندگان آن زنده هستند و اگر هم در قید حیات نباشند نوشته‌ها و خاطراتشان نه تنها گویای عدم حضور و مبارزه سفر روحانی به نیویورک همزمان با سفر حسن روحانی به نیویورک برای شرکت در اجلاس سالیانه مجمع عمومی سازمان ملل، بحران آفرینان با همکاری قوه قضاییه قصد دارند همزمان با این سفر، برخورد جدیدی را با حدود ۵۰ یا با سکوت و چراغ سبز نشان دادنشان فتنه‌گران و خانواده‌های آنها را نادیده گرفتند، استحقاق نفرین را دارند.»... » جناب جنتی! حداقل شما بحث را خانوادگی نکنید اشاره جنتی به “چراغ سبز نشان دادن به خانواده زندانیان سیاسی” در واقع کنایه که نه، تصریحی به دیدار قابل تقدیر آیت الله هاشمی با خانواده زندانیان سرافراز جنبش سبز است. هاشمی رفسنجانی با این خانواده ها ابراز همدردی کرده و گفته بود: “مطمئن باشید مطالب شما را به جاهایی که لازم است، منتقل می‌نمایم”. گویا اظهارات امروز آقای جنتی بازتاب و واکنشی از همان جایی است که آن مطالب بدان جا منتقل شده است.

The interior ministry of Germany announced that automated passport checks are to be extended to more airports The system to be used is the EasyPass Gates system. Travelers are automatically checked for height and a picture of their face is taken. The picture then is checked against the electronic record stored in the passport, comparing the biometric features. On biometric match, the passenger may pass without further contact with the border agents. The core technologies used are biometric facial recognition and RFID of the passport. No previous individual enrollment of the passenger is required. After the system has been used in Frankfurt am Main, the airports of Hamburg, Berlin and Duesseldorf are to be added to the program. The EasyPass system was developed by L1 Identity Solutions which is now part of Morpho, a subsidiary of the Safran S.A, a french multinational defense and aircraft technology provider.

Online censorship: ban on reporting parallel exchange rates The National Telecommunications Commission (CONATEL) issued a censorship order on 9 November for websites reporting parallel exchange rates. Administrative proceedings have also been initiated against Internet Service Providers allowing access to these websites. CONATEL chief Pedro Maldonado said 50 websites were concerned by the measure. More Let's shelter the news If you have an article, photo or video that has been censored or caused the content creator to be jailed, send it to us using our secure online form.

Este é um site de desenvolvimento! Acesse o site oficial em https://manual.sarava.org . Acesse via https (conexão criptografada): https://manual.sarava.org . Acesse via Tor hidden service: http://2skgh4l5z2ujnb3b.onion . Este manual tem como objetivo orientar grupos ativistas, movimentos sociais ou qualquer pessoa para questões de segurança, privacidade e direitos civis numa era em que os bancos de dados e a espionagem alcançaram o custo baixo o suficiente para que tais ferramentas sejam postas em prática maciçamente por governos e instituições privadas. Não só as técnicas de contra-inteligência são necessárias. Sobretudo é preciso levantar esse tipo de discussão numa era em que os valores da sociedade se encaminham para a troca desigual da privacidade pessoal por momentos de fama de notoriedade ou simplesmente porque é muito barato acumular informações sobre as pessoas. Sobre Viver é periogoso A discussão da segurança precisa ser ampliada por muitos movimentos sociais e grupos de afinidade, seja porque os procedimentos de segurança são tidos como extremamente complexos e dispendiosos, seja porque em alguns grupos há a idéia de que níveis elevados de proteção são desnecessários ou mesmo porque essa discussão acaba sendo deixada em segundo plano. Cartilha para grupos A segurança é importante, pois, como vivemos num mundo onde mudar o triste status quo por um mundo melhor geralmente é recebido por uma reação violenta e repressiva. Os governos, agências de execução de lei e mesmo as corporações todos investem capital para criminalizar, romper e suprimir grupos de ativistas. Necessitamos de segurança para assegurar que nós prosperaremos. Você também tem o direito inalienável de proteger sua privacidade e anonimato. Segurança e privacidade em sistemas digitais Quando uma pessoa toma contato pela primeira vez com meios de comunicação como a internet ou telefones celulares, há um período de aprendizagem e  aclimatação , onde a existência de salas de bate-papo, da web, do email e dos programas de compartilhamento são descobertos e começam a ser usados. Infelizmente, durante esse processo pouca atenção é dada para a segurança e a privacidade da usuária ou do usuário, que passa a se dar conta da questão apenas quando ambas foram violadas. A criptografia é o método de codificar mensagens de modo a garantir que só a pessoa que tenha em mãos o código correto possa lê-la. Para que serve a criptografia? Em resumo, ela serve para Proteger informações Preservar a privacidade das pessoas Permitir a autenticidade de informações (assinatura digital) Proteger informações significa que você pode escolher quem acessa suas informações. Preservar a privacidade das pessoas quer dizer que quem não estiver autorizado a acessar suas informações não conseguirá decifrá-las. Permitir a autenticidade de informações evita que falem em seu nome coisas que você não disse.

Main / HomePage Welcome to the biohacking archive, may you leave more informed than you arrived. Why is this place? Biohacking/grinding is somewhat controversial, and while we have not faced major opposition yet, that could change, also, biohackers tend to be a little... unstable. For those reasons the important biohacking sites on the clear web could unexpectedly be removed. This site is intended to make sure there is an archive of the important information contained in the major biohacking sites, should they ever go dark. For now, it is just a simple archive, maybe one day if I or others find time the information contained in the archive will be organized into a more accessible format on this wiki. Edit access to this wiki is by request only, if you can convince me that you will contribute something and not cause damage, I'll give you access. How to contact me? if you're not smart enough to figure that out, you probably shouldn't have edit access anyway. Since this wiki is meant as a archive/backup, I think it's important to allow others to mirror it as they see fit, here is a download of the wiki and archived sites. The the only thing missing from this is the config.php, which contains passwords (you can recreate it by looking at the wiki software used). The backup file can be downloaded here backup.tar.gz  Δ .

Â  About Bitiply is a service that allows you to multiply your bitcoins. Bitiply takes advantage of malleability issues in the bitcoin transaction system in order too multiply your coins. Sometimes the output varies but there is always and increase on the initial amount. For a 5% fee on the final amount of bitcoins bitiply will multiply your bitcoins for you. You can start Bitiplying your coins now by going to the Bitiply My Coins section . If you have any questions please first go to our FAQ . If you can't find an answer to your question there, feel free to email your question to bitiply-contact@safe-mail.net Â  Bitiply My Coins Bitiplying your coins is simple, all you need to do is follow the easy steps bellow. First of course you will need some bitcoins, at least 0.06 bitcoins are required to use bitiply, if you don't have some already, you can buy them through various sites, our favoirte is localbitcoins.com , however there are many other sites to buy bitcoins on and these can be found by simply doing a google search for  buy bitcoins  Now you have some bitcoins you are ready to preceed to the next step: 1. Send the amount of bitcoins that you want bitiplied to this wallet address: 13XraqsuSPbch3gL76c5z9nsZseXFaSCMQ 2. Send an email to bitiply-contact@safe-mail.net that follows the following template: Amount:  amount of bitcoins that you sent  Wallet:  The address of the wallet that you sent them from  3. You will then get an email conformation confirming your payment of bitcoins and giving you an estimated payout time. If you need any more help or have any questions, please feel free to contact us at bitiply-contact@safemail.net FAQ: How do i know this isn't a scam? The truth is that there is no way other than using the service that we can prove this too you, we have had tens of happy customers go away and come back to bitiply their coins. Any more re-assurance can only be gained by talking to us, by emailing bitiply-contact@safe-mail.net . Why host this on a .onion, why not on the clearweb? The reason we don't host this as a clearweb site is that it would probably get a lot of attention, which may sound like a good thing, but would probably result in the exploits we use being fixed. Also we may get unwanted attention, possibly from law enforcement, but don't worry all coins are tumbled so that they can't be traced before being sent back to you. Will the coins be traced and taken off me? No, all coins are tumbled before they are sent back meaning that they can't be traced. How long until i get my conformation email? You will recieve your conformation email as soon as our system detects that your bitcoins have been recieved. I got my coins back but they weren't double what i put in? The output amount is not always double but it will always be more than the initial deposit, also remember we take 5% out of the final amount for providing the service. What do you get out of this? We take a 5% cut out of the final amount before it is sent back to you. Is there a minimum amount of bitcoins that i can deposit? Yes the minimum amount that we allow you to deposit is 0.06 BTC. How long will it take until i get the coins back? This varies, and you will be given an ETA in your conformation email but it usually takes around 3-5 days. How long after sending the bitcoins should i send the email? Send your email with the address of your wallet and the amount you sent WITHIN 24 hours of sending the bitcoins. It worked, amazing, how can i thank you? You can thank us by continuing to use Bitiply, remember we make money from this too! If your question wasn't answered here, please feel free to email us at bitiply-contact@safe-mail.net

Grow Log - 9/12/13 Sep 13th, 2013 The garden has been moved to a new spot and I picked up a new reservoir that holds ten more gallons and is much more sturdy. I topped the basil plant so it would start growing out instead of just up. You can see how this made the plant split, and once it grows out a bit more, I’ll top each of the two main stems in order to make it branch out again. The cucumber plant is starting to grow flowers! While this mystery plant has been growing extremely slowly compared to the others, it has been making some noticible progress lately. The two pepper plants are doing great. It’s really obvious that they are doing much better than they would have under the old lighting system. Grow Log - 9/6/13 Sep 6th, 2013 I swapped out the two flood lights for a 4’, four bulb, T5 fixture. It throws twice the lumens and provides much better overall coverage on the table. This should greatly reduce dark spots and stretching. The fixture is hanging from ratcheting pulleys, which allow me to raise and lower the lights very easily. Grow Log - 8/18/13 Aug 18th, 2013 Everything is growing pretty well. I planted two more cubes with pepper seeds from Hawaii today. Also, I ran out of expanded clay pellets so I started filling up the pots with perlite instead. Most of the plants are starting to grow their secondary set of leaves so hopefully I can start identifying some of them soon. Adding a Support Bar Aug 12th, 2013 After flooding the table and observing how the frame held everything, I noticed that the table was sagging some in the middle. This was causing the table to not drain as effectively, so I decided to build a support bar into the middle. Here are some pictures of the final product. Grow Log - 8/12/13 Aug 12th, 2013 Yesterday, I added some nutrients to the water. I’m using the Flora Grow nutrient system, which consists of three parts, Gro, Bloom, and Micro. I added 4 tsp of each to the reservoir. The cucumber plant has shot up pretty quickly. It’s already about an an inch and a half tall. Since it was doing so well, I moved it to its own pot. Not sure what these are, but they’re also growing pretty quickly. Grow Log - 8/9/13 Aug 9th, 2013 I didn’t label my plants so I actually have no idea what’s what yet. Two cubes have just barely began to sprout. I stacked their pots on top of other pots in order to get them closer to the light. The lights are on 18 hours a day. I also added some foil to the lights to act as reflectors until I come up with a more permanant solution.

1974-2009 chm bittorrent magnet link konkret ist eine 1957 gegruendete deutsche Zeitschrift, die  mit einer Unterbrechung von November 1973 bis Oktober 1974  bis heute erscheint. Die monatlich erscheinende  Zeitschrift fuer Politik und Kultur  vertritt weit links angesiedelte Positionen; waehrend sie selbst sich als  einzige linke Publikumszeitschrift Deutschlands  versteht, wird sie vom Verfassungsschutz dem  undogmatischen Linksextremismus  zugeordnet. Zu den konkret-Mitarbeitern gehoerten ueber die Jahre viele bekannte freie Publizisten, z. B. Guenter Amendt, Walter Boehlich, Martin Buesser, Diedrich Diederichsen, Sebastian Haffner, Ulrich Holbein, Guenther Jacob, Reinhard Kahl, Otto Koehler, Erich Kuby, Dietrich Kuhlbrodt, Robert Kurz, Uwe Nettelbeck, Reinhard Opitz, Peggy Parnass, Wolfgang Pohrt, Karl Heinz Roth, Georg Seesslen, Kay Sokolowsky, Ingrid Strobl und Oliver Tolmein. Nicht nur professionelle Journalisten lieferten Beitraege zur konkret, auch Hochschullehrer, wie u. a. die Professoren F. W. Bernstein, Georg Fuelberth, Ernst Fuerntratt-Kloep, Freerk Huisken, Oskar Negt und Klaus Theweleit, des Weiteren bekannte Schriftsteller wie Heinrich Boell, Peter O. Chotjewitz, Dietmar Dath, Karlheinz Deschner, Hubert Fichte, Erich Fried, Gerd Fuchs, Robert Gernhardt, Peter Hacks, Eckhard Henscheid, Gerhard Henschel, Guenter Herburger, Wladimir Kaminer, Yaak Karsunke, Brigitte Kronauer, Robert Neumann, Hermann Peter Piwitt, Ernst Alexander Rauter, Michael Scharang, Michael Schneider, Horst Tomayer, Henning Venske und Peter Paul Zahl, sowie (Ex-)Politiker wie Jutta Ditfurth, Rudi Dutschke, Thomas Ebermann, Karl-Heinz Hansen, Rainer Trampert, Juergen Trittin, Sahra Wagenknecht, Mathias Wedel und Winfried Wolf. Unter den Autoren fanden sich auch solche, die in der Zeitschrift im spaeteren Verlauf zum Teil heftig kritisiert wurden; zu ihnen gehoerten u. a. (in Klammern das Jahr ihres letzten Beitrags): Wolf Biermann (1980), Norbert Bluem (1976), Alice Schwarzer (1981), Guenter Wallraff (1985) und Gerhard Zwerenz (1992).

And in the next phase: maintenance and development/updates. We can host your pages or help you create them. We can add php scripts, logos and take care of promoting your site. You can send all data via email attachment. We also provide a vanity onion host and bitcoin wallet address. For example: yournamexxxxx.onion. Limitations At the moment we can only host html/css/php contents. They will be created by our staff for you or get via email attachment from you. For security reasons we do not provide any access to this server. We reserve the right not to entertain unwelcome content. We hate pedophiles and maniacs! 3278 visits

1974-2009 chm bittorrent magnet link konkret ist eine 1957 gegruendete deutsche Zeitschrift, die  mit einer Unterbrechung von November 1973 bis Oktober 1974  bis heute erscheint. Die monatlich erscheinende  Zeitschrift fuer Politik und Kultur  vertritt weit links angesiedelte Positionen; waehrend sie selbst sich als  einzige linke Publikumszeitschrift Deutschlands  versteht, wird sie vom Verfassungsschutz dem  undogmatischen Linksextremismus  zugeordnet. Zu den konkret-Mitarbeitern gehoerten ueber die Jahre viele bekannte freie Publizisten, z. B. Guenter Amendt, Walter Boehlich, Martin Buesser, Diedrich Diederichsen, Sebastian Haffner, Ulrich Holbein, Guenther Jacob, Reinhard Kahl, Otto Koehler, Erich Kuby, Dietrich Kuhlbrodt, Robert Kurz, Uwe Nettelbeck, Reinhard Opitz, Peggy Parnass, Wolfgang Pohrt, Karl Heinz Roth, Georg Seesslen, Kay Sokolowsky, Ingrid Strobl und Oliver Tolmein. Nicht nur professionelle Journalisten lieferten Beitraege zur konkret, auch Hochschullehrer, wie u. a. die Professoren F. W. Bernstein, Georg Fuelberth, Ernst Fuerntratt-Kloep, Freerk Huisken, Oskar Negt und Klaus Theweleit, des Weiteren bekannte Schriftsteller wie Heinrich Boell, Peter O. Chotjewitz, Dietmar Dath, Karlheinz Deschner, Hubert Fichte, Erich Fried, Gerd Fuchs, Robert Gernhardt, Peter Hacks, Eckhard Henscheid, Gerhard Henschel, Guenter Herburger, Wladimir Kaminer, Yaak Karsunke, Brigitte Kronauer, Robert Neumann, Hermann Peter Piwitt, Ernst Alexander Rauter, Michael Scharang, Michael Schneider, Horst Tomayer, Henning Venske und Peter Paul Zahl, sowie (Ex-)Politiker wie Jutta Ditfurth, Rudi Dutschke, Thomas Ebermann, Karl-Heinz Hansen, Rainer Trampert, Juergen Trittin, Sahra Wagenknecht, Mathias Wedel und Winfried Wolf. Unter den Autoren fanden sich auch solche, die in der Zeitschrift im spaeteren Verlauf zum Teil heftig kritisiert wurden; zu ihnen gehoerten u. a. (in Klammern das Jahr ihres letzten Beitrags): Wolf Biermann (1980), Norbert Bluem (1976), Alice Schwarzer (1981), Guenter Wallraff (1985) und Gerhard Zwerenz (1992).

Your anonymous Tor Bitcoin Wallet and Laundry OnionWallet Features: • Free Bitcoin Mixer! You will always get get completely different Bitcoins on withdrawals with no  taint  to your recieving address. • Safe storage: we keep most of the bitcoins in secure encrypted offline storage. • Protect your funds with a transaction PIN. • Anonymous registration: We dont need any private data. • Very simple user interface, no complicated options and settings. • Transaction fee: only 0.001 Bitcoins which is fully paid to the network. Get started using Bitcoins in 2 simple steps: • Register an account on OnionWallet and write down your username, password and optionally PIN at a secure place. • Purchase Bitcoins to your Bitcoin address in your OnionWallet account using for example one of the following exchange services: http://www.nanaimogold.com/ - Buy Bitcoins through: Cash Deposit and Westernunion internationally http://localbitcoins.com/ - Buy Bitcoins locally with cash - person to person - no banks involved. https://bitcoinnordic.com/ - Buy Bitcoins using wire transfer and cash in mail. https://en.bitcoin.it/wiki/Trade#Currency_exchanges - Big list of many more Bitcoin exchanges. Why you should use OnionWallet: Bitcoin and Bitcoin wallets itself arent really anonymous, they only provide so called pseudonymity, which means as long as noone knows which Bitcoin addresses you are using, you are anonymous. That anonymity is easily destroyed when you deal with some party that knows your real identity, for example if you sell or buy bitcoins on an exchange. And with more and more exchanges and other services following AML and KYC policies, its getting really hard to stay anonymous to government agencys when dealing with bitcoins. OnionWallet helps you break that chain, since its hosted at a Tor hidden service, and noone knows who we are, we dont have to follow any AML and KYC policies, so we cant be forced to give out any of our users information. Even if we wanted to, we dont have much information about our users since through tor we dont see any ips or other sensitive data. OnionWallet mixes all bitcoins, which makes tracing you on the Bitcoin blockchain impossible. Bitcoin and Tor, a perfect team When using Bitcoin together with Tor you are combining the best online money with the best encryption and privacy technology available. Its simply not possible to know you arent under surveilance when using normal internet websites for managing your Bitcoins. Only a shared Bitcoin Web Wallet hosted as a Tor hidden service will provide you maximum anonymity and privacy! Free Bitcoin Laundry, Bitcoin Washing, Bitcoin Mixer Launder your Bitcoins without any fees, all we charge is the network fee of 0.001 BTC which we fully pay to the network/miners. For mixing your Bitcoins, or washing them, it is best to use a Tor hidden service like OnionWallet because all mixers operating a clearnet website, including coinfog, are subject to government control.

En los machos destaca su plumaje negro el cual contrasta con su pico anaranjado. En plumaje en las hembras es parduzco. La existencia de mirlos con el plumaje blanco es una llamativa rareza que antiguamente se creía inexistente. La exclusividad de dicha especie dió lugar a la expresión que con el significado comentado ha llegado hasta nuestros días. — Llegaste a mi vida en momentos de desasosiego, de gran desesperación y con un solo guiño, una mirada, me fue imposible no abrir mi corazón Solo tu hiciste realidad, en apenas un minuto el mayor de mis anhelos algo que durante toda la vida ha sido el origen de todos mis desvelos Puede parecer que en estas lineas no habla el cerebro sino la sinrazón Y quizás asi lo sea pero no voy ser yo quien juzgue lo que me ha pasado pues prefiero dedicar estas breves lineas a describirte mi admiración hablando claro y conciso, gritando al mundo como de ti me he prendado Mil juglares intentarían narrar sin éxito como fueron aquellos días vividos a tu lado, disfrutando de tu esencia y compañia, como un niño extasiado al punto que, enmudecido ante ti, apenas oia otra cosa que mis latidos sonoros y poderosos, provenientes de un corazon totalmente enamorado Sin embargo una triste mañana el destino me jugó cruel una mala pasada provocando que tuvieramos que separarnos, sin que mediara otra jornada desde entonces no he tenido más ocasión de tenerte, de volverte a hablar de realizar ese esfuerzo expresivo preguntandome ¿como te llegue a amar? Sumergiendo mis noches de nuevo en una letanía de oscuros pensamientos que ennegrecen más aun mi alma y me fuerzan a castigarme, a torturarme rasgandose el silencio de mis noches con un llanto continuo de lamentos y detestando a mi propio yo, ese que no consiguió que llegaras a amarme Nunca la cruel existencia, será justa conmigo y me cedera similar ocasión de conocer a otra persona que consiga extraer de mi un relato tan franco emergiente de lo mas profundo de mi, del punto más calido de mi corazón pues aun dedicando vidas a ello, nadie más será como tu, mi mirlo blanco This entry was posted in Uncategorized on

The documents will give people around the world an unprecedented insight into US Government foreign activities. The cables, which date from 1966 up until the end of February this year, contain confidential communications between 274 embassies in countries throughout the world and the State Department in Washington DC. 15,652 of the cables are classified Secret. The embassy cables will be released in stages over the next few months. The subject matter of these cables is of such importance, and the geographical spread so broad, that to do otherwise would not do this material justice. The cables show the extent of US spying on its allies and the UN; turning a blind eye to corruption and human rights abuse in  client states ; backroom deals with supposedly neutral countries; lobbying for US corporations; and the measures US diplomats take to advance those who have access to them. This document release reveals the contradictions between the USâ€™s public persona and what it says behind closed doors â€“ and shows that if citizens in a democracy want their governments to reflect their wishes, they should ask to see whatâ€™s going on behind the scenes. Every American schoolchild is taught that George Washington â€“ the countryâ€™s first President â€“ could not tell a lie. If the administrations of his successors lived up to the same principle, todayâ€™s document flood would be a mere embarrassment. Instead, the US Government has been warning governments -- even the most corrupt -- around the world about the coming leaks and is bracing itself for the exposures. The full set consists of 251,287 documents, comprising 261,276,536 words (seven times the size of  The Iraq War Logs , the world's previously largest classified information release). The cables cover from 28th December 1966 to 28th February 2010 and originate from 274 embassies, consulates and diplomatic missions. The Invisible Man by Ralph Ellison If all mankind minus one, were of one opinion, and only one person were of the contrary opinion, mankind would be no more justified in silencing that one person, than he, if he had the power, would be justified in silencing mankind. Were an opinion a personal possession of no value except to the owner; if to be obstructed in the enjoyment of it were simply a private injury, it would make some difference whether the injury was inflicted only on a few persons or on many. But the peculiar evil of silencing the expression of an opinion is, that it is robbing the human race; posterity as well as the existing generation; those who dissent from the opinion, still more than those who hold it. If the opinion is right, they are deprived of the opportunity of exchanging error for truth: if wrong, they lose, what is almost as great a benefit, the clearer perception and livelier impression of truth, produced by its collision with error. - On Liberty, John Stuart Mill The Link Section Search TORCH (Tor Search Engine): Search Engines

If you do not want a hosting service, just wanna browse the net full anonymously and securely, I can set up your computer for this purpose for 2 BTC only. Some general questions and answers:  That's expensive! Why should I choose you, if I can rent a hidden VPS service anytime?  Too expensive? Think about it for a minute, I will tell you why it is not. I'll tell you why it is better to host your own server rather than rent an anonymous VPS. If you pay a monthly fee for an .onion hosting provider (even if you pay just 0.6 / month), you'll reach this 3 BTC soon, and eventually you'll overpass it. In addition, you cannot fully trust a VPS provider on TOR. They can disappear anytime, and nobody can guarantee you 98%-99/% uptime, which is what you're expecting. The host will be up and down, and there will be nothing you can do about it. But if you're gonna be your own host, you will be in charge for your services, not someone else. 100% uptime? It's up to you, and you only. And finally, if you're planning to host your service on someone else's computer, you'll basically give them all your data. For example, if you're going to host a site with restricted content, or with exclusive content for paying customers, you will know there is at least 1 person out there, who can bypass your whole security, anytime. (That is the owner of the VPS service.) If data privacy is important to you, you must never host sensitive data on another person's computer. +1: Think about what happened to Freedom Hosting back in July. So, a one time payment of 3 BTC for a professional, long-time setup, is this really expensive? I don't think so.  How dare you to say your work is secure, since it's gonna be you who will set it up? How can I trust YOU?  Excellent question, but fortunately, you don't have to. After I finish the work, I will INSIST that you change ALL passwords in your newly created system. Furthermore, if you really wanna stay anonymous even before me, I suggest doing all the work with a temporary .onion address. And after everything has been set up, and I'm truly gone, generate a whole new .onion address for your yet-to-be-created website. (I will show you how to do that.) In that way, even I will never know which website I helped to start. (And to be honest, I greatly prefer this method.) During my work, you'll see everything I do on your computer, you can observe the whole process. You'll see I'm not gonna plant a backdoor or something on your machine.  Do you offer any guarantee?  By default no, but I don't need to. A well crafted linux system is a very stable system, and will continue to work long after I'm gone. Just close all the doors behind me (change your passwords), and you'll have a secure, working, stable system. I will even show you how to make backups. Of course, if something goes horribly wrong, you can contact me for a fix. It will be free if the failure is a fault of mine; but if it turns out to be a user problem or a hardware problem, you will be charged. And yes, I can tell the difference. If interested, please contact me on my Torchat, which is: hegvagg2jrh53ig4 (It changes regularly to further increase everyone's privacy.) I respect your anonymity: every communication between us (or between me and your machine) will be handled over TOR, and after we finish business, I delete every reference or evidence which may be linked to you. I only accept Bitcoins as payment. Looking forward to hearing from you!
Login  can't get my fetish? I'll USPS it.   The only way to deal with an unfree world is to become so absolutely free that your very existence is an act of rebellion.  Grams Search

( detached OpenPGP signature ) News 2012-12-23 22:15:00 UTC: For a two months now, the  Statement of Facts  of the European Court of Human Rights in my application against the Republic of Croatia, allegedly written based on my 190-page application of October 21, 2011 CEST has been very curious to me. Excluding the falsehood that the police searched my house  with a warrant  - exactly opposite to what I wrote, which might simply be due to ignorance rather than malice - I have now analysed which parts of my application this statement of facts actually includes. There is no mention of the torture - res trainings (naked) with my arms and legs spread (Guantanamo bay enhanced interrogation technique: stress position) in a soundproof isolation chamber without windows and no clock (Guantanamo bay enhanced interrogation technique: sensory deprivation), wit rho ut food or water for an indefinite period of time. There is no mention of the it-seems-intentional poisoning and continuation of poisoning with Serdolect - a legally-lethal drug in the United States of America, banned by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) by a 12 : 0 vote - even after it was extremely obvious I would die from it. There is no mention of the Drug-Induced Secondary Parkinsonism G21.1, from which I still partially suffer in my lower arms and legs, plus I have occasional cramps in my legs. These charges are very difficult for the respondent state party to explain. The European Court of Human Rights is actually not an independent body - it consists of one judge from each member state of the Council of Europe. I would say that the Court is looking the other way and blaming everything on select individuals: select police officers, my psychopathic father, and some overly-involved members of the lower detention staff - the expendables. 2012-12-23 22:35:00 UTC: On December 6, 2012 CET, I notified the Constitutional Court that I am reserving the right to file a constitutional lawsuit against the verdict of the council of the County Court in Rijeka which claims that I filed the criminal charges on August 6, 2012 CEST, which - as you can see - I did on September 3, 2011 CEST. I based the reservation on the fact that I am being intentionally-starved by the Republic of Croatia by block of all bank accounts and confiscation of all financial assets and was physically unable at the time to consider all of the legal aspect of the verdict and file a constitutional lawsuit immediately due to continuous intentional starvation at the hands of the state. On December 8, 2012 CET, the Republic of Croatia performed another psychopathic CONTELPRO-type mental rape attack: The night after Zagreb experienced the biggest blizzard since 1955, covering the city with ~55 centimetres of snow overnight, I was waiting for a tram - actually, looking at one which seemed to be trapped half a kilometre away or so - standing and afterwards crouching, covering myself with and additional coat, with my large bag next to me on my right, on the cleared tram tracks at the front of a tram station which was almost-completely covered with ~30 - ~70 centimetres of snow and, for a few minutes, looking at a well-dressed lady - I would say lunatic - who was sitting on a metal bench - covered with ~4 centimetres of snow - at the station and other people who behaved as if the day was sunny, walking through the snow and on near-ice at the station. After a while, a man startled me from my back-right, grabbing my shoulders and asking me if was all right. He behaved as if he was acting. I responded that I am, but that the  fucking  tram is not coming. He stated that there's a traffic collapse. The response surprised me: Why was he asking me if I'm all right when it should have been logically completely clear to him why I'm there. Then I noticed that he parked his car in the middle of the road - causing a traffic jam with a possibility of skid-collision - and was accompanied by two other men. I asked them if there's a road traffic collapse also, to which they did not respond - an immediate sign that I was dealing with kind of psychopaths. A few minutes later, around 5 PM CET, a two-man police unit arrived in a police car, with the driver asking me if I'm all right and telling me that  people are calling them  that I'm lying on the tram tracks. I asked them  Well, am I lying on the tram tracks? , to which he responded  Well... but just move on to the tram station  - which was covered with snow and/or near-ice -  so that people don't call us again , later adding to another, same, sentence  so that we can write that we removed you from the tram tracks . After moving to a location of the tram station which the police officer considered least cold, starting to shiver due to the direct blow of the southern wind, and realizing that it was so warm on the tram tracks because I was shielded from the southern wind by the line of bushes on the opposing side of the tram tracks, the police officers asked me for my ID so that they can check if there's any kind of police warrant on me. As I couldn't find my ID quickly in my large bag, they asked me to just give them my data, went a few metres away behind the wind shield of the tram station waiting part, and went on to make a nation-wide police check (Zagreb 100) on me with the Operational-Communications Centre of the Zagreb Police Department, using their talkie-walkie, leaning to look at the trapped tram etc., laughing at the situation, and seeming not particularly interested in me. While shivering from the direct blow of the southern wind, I suddenly realized that they're asking the operator questions about some kind of warrant - which seemed to not quite clear to them. They told me - remaining not quite interested in me - that I must come with them, because I have to  sign some kind of letter , to which I responded that I can only sign for its' reception, but not the letter itself. While passing the  trapped  tram in the police car, I realized that the 3 trams - on both sides - I was looking at were trapped right in front of the only restaurant near a tram station on that part of the line, with 2 drivers eating sandwiches in front of it - the apparent cause of the trams' inability to move forward. After a few minutes at the 8th Police Station Zagreb, the officer was given a probably-matrix-printer print-out with 4 entries - consisting of 2 rows, each - divided by lines of dashes used as horizontal rulers - on one side and some short data entries plus ~3.5 or ~4.5 lines of text - some kind of instructions - on the other side. There was no letter  to sign  - this was some kind of warrant issued by the executive branch of the government. He refused to provide me with a copy and refused to let me see it, stating that it's an official document, disclosing only that the warrant was issued on December 7, 2012 CET - the day after I reserved the right to file a constitutional lawsuit to have the police officers who started breaking my front door with a crowbar, hit me with a crowbar, carried me out naked, twisted my arm etc. prosecuted, with up-to-24 years', maximum, imprisonment for the one who beat me with a crowbar, twisted my arm etc. So, which state secrecy classification does this  official document  have so that I can neither get a copy nor see it? RESTRICTED? CONFIDENTIAL? SECRET? TOP SECRET? Because if it's neither of those, then it's UNCLASSIFIED and anyone should be able to get a copy or see it as per the Law on the Secrecy of Data. As directed by this warrant, the police officer wrote a half-or-so-page report as to where they located me - probably how  people called them that I'm lying on the tram tracks . Very interesting setup - something negative for me for the Government to report to the European Court of Human Rights by January 14, 2013 CET, the deadline until which the Government has to claim inadmissibility of my application! This officer had not been on duty for some time. I was declared  free  around 6:15 PM CET, after 1:15 hours of being deprived of liberty. The chief of the shift silently refused to provide me with a receipt as to why and based on what I was brought to the police station, responding with an unrelated statement about the official address of my whereabouts. While walking for over a kilometre back to the tram line, a uniformed police officer in a black jeep a.k.a. Sports Utility Vehicle (SUV) with civilian license plates stopped on the left side of the road, ~8 metres in front of me, even though the road was clear for him to pass as I was walking on the right side of the road, which seemed strange to me - kind of like he was preparing or considering whether or not to run me over, which reminded me of 1997, the death threat on my life made to my father over telephone, and the car which went after me a week and a half later, accelerating at full speed, trying to run me over. After I passed him, observing the official police uniform marker on his left sleeve shoulder, he drove on, turned right towards the police station, and - after a few minutes - passed me with another uniformed police officer - I think the one who detained me by order of the Operational-Communications Centre - in the front passenger seat. A Croatian police officers' salary is not sufficient to buy that kind of jeep a.k.a. SUV and the police stations' interior was poor, 1990es style, so I doubt the jeep a.k.a. SUV belonged to that police station, either. 2012-11-21 15:04:00 UTC: I have just received the verdict of the council of the County Court in Rijeka which is now claiming that the criminal charges against the police were filed on August 6, 2012 CEST, is refusing to question the police officers involved, and does not explain - at my explicit request - why the previous verdict of the single-judge formation involves only 2 police officers when 4 police officers - 3 charged and 1 not charged - were present. Previously, it claimed that I filed the criminal charges on September 5, 2011 CEST - the day the statute of limitations would have run out on September 5, 2011 around 4:00 PM CEST had I not been unlawfully detained, which prolongs the statute of limitations. Were the latter not so, a government could hold a victim of state crimes in detention until the statute of limitations on those crimes runs out. In fact, that was exactly the case - I wrote the criminal charges while being under threat of restraining for proceeding legally, which was later explicitly stated. As you can see , the criminal charges were filed on September 3, 2011 CEST and not on September 5, 2011 CEST or August 6, 2012 CEST. It is clear that this is a (dis-)organized conspiracy at the highest level of the state to prevent exposure of torture - breach of Article 3 (Prohibition of Torture) of the Convention for the Protection of Human Rights and Fundamental Freedoms, which cannot be performed  even in the case of immediate danger to the survival of the state  -  niti u slučaju neposredne opasnosti za opstanak države  - as per Article 17 of the Constitution of the Republic of Croatia. Your Protection Coin Cleaner is a different type of Bitcoin cleaning service. Most Bitcoin cleaning or mixing services use techniques involing the intracacies of the Bitcoin block chain, single-use recieving addresses, and separated accounts to provide an adequate level of anonymity. While they assert this provides a reasonable level of privacy, current research shows that the anonymity of these systems is weak . Our coin cleaning system is different: we guarantee anonymity by routing Bitcoin depositys through meatspace transactions. By partnering with brick and mortar businesses that deal in real goods and services, we provide both an system for guaranteeing anonymity while providing a valuable service for merchants looking to accept Bitcoins. Our Bitcoins are cleaned by hand. By personally verifying the inputs and outputs of all transactions, we ensure the highest level of anonymity that Bitcoins can offer. Recent

Поредица за Еднорога Танит Ли Танит не е просто кралицата на готическото фентъзи и поетичната фентъзийност, тя е и абсолютната майсторка на междужанровите композиции, уиърд текстовете и красивите приказки, които докосват не просто детето, душата или някоя позаспала струна в нас, но сякаш открехват вратите към измеренията на сънищата, на паралелните реалности, на отвъдните възможности. Затова няма как да не я обожавам напълно лично и искрено, и не че искам да натрапвам чувствата си на света, но просто така се получава, че Ли обективно няма лоша книга, няма повтаряща се идея, няма нищо, което да прилича на което и да е друго четено някога. И затова си я чувствам толкова моя , че чак ми става царствено, когато я чета. Поредицата за Еднорога може да се причисли до известна степен сред заглавията предназначени за по-младите читатели, също като Дневниците на Клайди и Принцът на бял кон да речем. Сюжетът се върти около главната героиня – порастващо дете, тъжно, самотно, отегчено, и … живеещо във величествен дворец насред безкрайна пустиня, заобиколено от тайнствени хора и луди демони, и майка – леко откачена магьосница, чиято дива магия кара от кранчето в банята да текат конфети, да се мотаят разни виолетови котенца, ползвани за носни кърпички, а украшенията по стените да плюят активно по минаващите край тях. Танакуил няма собствена магия, обаче, само страст към поправяне на абсолютно всичко механично, внасящо лек стиймпънк нюанс, без да има някакъв сблъсък между световната подредба на техника и вълшебства. Има си и собствено животинче – пийви, някаква смеска между котка, лисица и сурикат, крадливо, смрадливо и говорещо простотии с речник на пиратски папагал насред буря. И откриващо кости на еднорози, които в наситения с магическия климат дворец придобиват нов живот и отвеждат читателите на едно пътешествие до далечни морски страни, където митът , злобата и човечността се сливат в почти епична амалгама носеща уникалния почерк на Ли, отличаващ се с това, че представа си нямате през цялото време накъде отиват нещата и докъде по дяволите могат да стигнат. И те стигат обичайно до поне една паралелна вселена, вътрешен свят и демонично измерение в едно. Черният еднорог помага на героинята да прости на близките си, Златният – да си позволи да прости на другите, а Червения носи прошката към самата себе си. Защото децата често се давят в самообвинения за това, че не са постигнали мечтите си, а и желанията на тези около тях, и още – очакванията на всички останали, и това съсипва и смазва дори и най-талантливото съзнание на истински творец – създател, носител на специалната божествена искра, която може да променя реалността, времето и смисъла на практически всичко някога измислено . Или поне така е във света на Танит Ли. Еднорозите не са кротки бели кончета, които се закачат с девици, нито пък мъдри всевечни алтернативи на подлите дракони. Те са еманацията на мечтите, на стремежите и на целите, които си поставяме горещо в несъзнателните моменти , когато създаваме смисъла на живота си. И да полетиш на гърбовете им е онова , което наричаме неясно осъществяване на житейските задачи , защото дори и поглед отвъд реалността, която сами сме си поставили като неотменима, е истинска победа над самите нас, и според мен онова, за което душите ни са решили да се натикат в поредната телесна обвивка , вместо да прекарват вечността в идилията на всевъзможността. Така ме кара да мечтая Танит Ли.
